channel.title: Travel on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on My New Hugo Site

item.description: This sturdy wooden cart is supported by four over-sized treadwheels, each of which contains a magical rat. The cart can carry up to 2000 pounds of weight, and balances itself. It moves at a speed of 40 ft. for up to eight hours per day, but never between midnight to dawn. The cart follows your simple verbal commands to start, stop, turn, etc. Each rat may be fed1 daily for a hour of extra performance.
